mapper.select: select a.*,p.participant_seq, p.approvalstatus, p.approvaltype, p.id from approval a, participant p where a.appr_seq = p.appr_seq and p.approvalstatus = 4098 and p.approvaltype = 4
select a.appr_seq, p.line_seq, p.approvaltype, p.participant_seq from approval a inner join participant p on a.appr_seq = p.appr_seq where a.appr_seq = #{appr_seq} order by p.line_seq
